00037 map<string, string > AnnotationTable::m_columnNameToColumnTypeMap;
00038 string AnnotationTable::m_rowCount;

00040     
00041 AnnotationTable::AnnotationTable(sqlite3* AnnotationDb, Configuration* ConfigPtr, 
00042                                  LocalizationTable* LocalizationTablePtr, ChromosomeTable* ChromosomeTablePtr)
00043 {
00044     m_annotationDb = AnnotationDb;
00045     m_configPtr = ConfigPtr;
00046     m_localizationTablePtr = LocalizationTablePtr;
00047     m_chromosomeTablePtr = ChromosomeTablePtr;
00048     m_stopDbInsertion = false;
00049 }
00050 void AnnotationTable::LoadColumntTypes()
00051 {
00052     sqlite3_stmt *compiledStatement;         
00053     string sqlStatement = "Select * from Annotations";
00054     int result = sqlite3_prepare_v2(m_annotationDb, sqlStatement.c_str(), -1, &compiledStatement, NULL);
00055     if (result != SQLITE_OK)
00056     {    
00057         std::string message = INTERNAL_ERROR_FAILED_TO_PREPARE_SQL_STATEMENT + sqlStatement;
00058         throw Except(message.c_str());
00059     }
00060     
00061     m_columnNameToColumnTypeMap.clear();
00062     for (int columnIndex = 0;  columnIndex < sqlite3_column_count(compiledStatement); columnIndex++)
00063     {
00064        std::string columnName = sqlite3_column_name (compiledStatement, columnIndex);
00065        std::string  columnType = sqlite3_column_decltype (compiledStatement, columnIndex);
00066        Util::upcaseString_inplace(columnType);
00067        //std::transform(columnType.begin(), columnType.end(), columnType.begin(), toupper);
00068        
00069        //See http://www.sqlite.org/datatype3.html       
00070        
00071        if (columnType.find("INT") != std::string::npos)
00072        {
00073             columnType = DB_TYPE_INTEGER;
00074        }
00075        else if ((columnType.find("REAL") != std::string::npos) || (columnType.find("FLOA") != std::string::npos)
00076                 || (columnType.find("DOUB") != std::string::npos))
00077        {
00078             columnType = DB_TYPE_REAL;
00079        }
00080        else
00081        {
00082             columnType = DB_TYPE_TEXT;
00083        }
00084        m_columnNameToColumnTypeMap.insert(std::make_pair(columnName, columnType));
00085     }
00086     
00087     sqlite3_finalize(compiledStatement);
00088     
00089 }
00090 
00091 vector<string> AnnotationTable::GetListOfDbColumnsForTsvFile(AnnotationTsv* TsvFilePtr)
00092 {
00093     vector<string> result;
00094     for(int columnIndex = 0; columnIndex < TsvFilePtr->GetColumnCount(); columnIndex++)
00095     {           
00096         string csvColumnName;
00097         GetCsvColumnName(columnIndex, csvColumnName);
00098         if (m_configPtr->IsCloneableColumn(csvColumnName))
00099         {
00100             std::vector<string> columnClones = m_configPtr->GetColumnClones(csvColumnName);            
00101             for (unsigned int i = 0; i < columnClones.size(); i++)
00102             {
00103                result.push_back(columnClones[i]);
00104             }
00105         }
00106         else if (csvColumnName == m_configPtr->m_par1CsvColumnName || csvColumnName == m_configPtr->m_par2CsvColumnName)
00107         {
00108             result.push_back(m_configPtr->m_parDbColumnName);
00109         }
00110         else
00111         {// "Normal" column                            
00112             result.push_back(GetDbColumnNameFromLocalizationTable(csvColumnName));
00113         }                        
00114     }
00115     return result;
00116 }

00120 void AnnotationTable::PrepareUpdateStatement(AnnotationTsv* TsvFilePtr)
00121 {
00122     std::stringstream  commandText;
00123     commandText << "UPDATE Annotations SET ";    
00124 
00125     m_updateBindingMap.clear();
00126     int columnCounter = 1;
00127     
00128     vector<string> listOfDbColumns = GetListOfDbColumnsForTsvFile(TsvFilePtr);   
00129     for(unsigned int columnIndex = 0; columnIndex < listOfDbColumns.size(); columnIndex++)
00130     {
00131          string dbColumnName = listOfDbColumns[columnIndex];
00132                     
00133         if (dbColumnName != "ProbeSet_ID")
00134         {
00135             m_updateBindingMap.insert(std::make_pair(dbColumnName, columnCounter));
00136             
00137             if (columnCounter > 1)
00138             {
00139                 commandText << ", ";            
00140             }
00141             
00142             commandText << "[" << dbColumnName << "] = " << "?";                        
00143             columnCounter++;
00144         }
00145     }
00146 
00147     commandText << " WHERE ProbeSet_ID = ?";
00148     m_updateBindingMap.insert(std::make_pair("ProbeSet_ID", columnCounter));
00149         
00150     if (m_updateStatement != NULL)
00151     {
00152         sqlite3_finalize(m_updateStatement);
00153     }
00154     int result = sqlite3_prepare_v2(m_annotationDb, commandText.str().c_str(), -1, &m_updateStatement, NULL);
00155     
00156     if (result != SQLITE_OK)
00157     {                     
00158         std::string message = INTERNAL_ERROR_FAILED_TO_PREPARE_SQL_STATEMENT + commandText.str();
00159         throw Except(message.c_str());
00160     }
00161 }
00162 
00163 void AnnotationTable::PrepareInsertStatement(AnnotationTsv* TsvFilePtr)
00164 {
00165     std::stringstream  commandTextColumns;
00166     commandTextColumns << "INSERT INTO Annotations (";
00167     
00168     std::stringstream  commandTextValues;
00169     commandTextValues << " VALUES (";
00170 
00171     m_insertBindingMap.clear();
00172     vector<string> listOfDbColumns = GetListOfDbColumnsForTsvFile(TsvFilePtr);   
00173     for(unsigned int columnIndex = 0; columnIndex < listOfDbColumns.size(); columnIndex++)
00174     {   
00175                 
00176         m_insertBindingMap.insert(std::make_pair(listOfDbColumns[columnIndex], columnIndex + 1));
00177         
00178         if (columnIndex > 0)
00179         {
00180             commandTextColumns << ",";
00181             commandTextValues << ",";
00182         }
00183                 
00184         commandTextColumns << "[" << listOfDbColumns[columnIndex] << "]";        
00185         commandTextValues << "?";                
00186     }   
00187      
00188     commandTextColumns << ")";
00189     commandTextValues << ")";         
00190      
00191     std::string insertSqlStatement =  commandTextColumns.str() + commandTextValues.str();
00192     
00193     if (m_insertStatement != NULL)
00194     {
00195         sqlite3_finalize(m_insertStatement);
00196     }
00197     
00198     int result = sqlite3_prepare_v2(m_annotationDb, insertSqlStatement.c_str(), -1, &m_insertStatement, NULL);
00199     
00200     if (result != SQLITE_OK)
00201     {                     
00202         std::string message = INTERNAL_ERROR_FAILED_TO_PREPARE_SQL_STATEMENT + insertSqlStatement;
00203         throw Except(message.c_str());
00204     }
00205 }
00206 
00207 void AnnotationTable::CheckIfNeedToAddColumn(string DbColumnName, string ColumnType)
00208 {    
00209     map<string,string>::iterator columnNameColumnType = m_columnNameToColumnTypeMap.find(DbColumnName);
00210     if ( columnNameColumnType == m_columnNameToColumnTypeMap.end()) 
00211     {        
00212         std::map<string, string>::iterator columnToAdd = m_listOfColumnsToAdd.find(DbColumnName);
00213         if ( columnToAdd == m_listOfColumnsToAdd.end()) 
00214         {            
00215             m_listOfColumnsToAdd.insert(std::make_pair(DbColumnName, ColumnType));
00216         } 
00217     } 
00218 }
00219 void AnnotationTable::CheckIfNeedToAddColumn(string CsvColumnName)
00220 {
00221     string dbColumnName =  m_localizationTablePtr->GetDbColumnName(CsvColumnName);    
00222     if (dbColumnName.empty())
00223     { 
00224        dbColumnName = StringUtilities::MakeColumnName(CsvColumnName);
00225     }
00226          
00227     map<string,string>::iterator columnNameColumnType = m_columnNameToColumnTypeMap.find(dbColumnName);
00228     if ( columnNameColumnType == m_columnNameToColumnTypeMap.end()) 
00229     {        
00230         std::map<string, string>::iterator columnToAdd = m_listOfColumnsToAdd.find(dbColumnName);
00231         if ( columnToAdd == m_listOfColumnsToAdd.end()) 
00232         {
00233             string columnType = DB_TYPE_TEXT;
00234             
00235             map<string, string>::iterator columnTypes = m_configPtr->m_columnTypes.find(CsvColumnName);        
00236             if (columnTypes != m_configPtr->m_columnTypes.end())
00237             {
00238                 columnType = columnTypes->second; // Column type from config
00239             }
00240             m_listOfColumnsToAdd.insert(std::make_pair(dbColumnName, columnType));
00241         } 
00242     } 
00243 }
00244 
00245 void AnnotationTable::AddColumns()
00246 {    
00247     
00248     char *errorMessage = NULL;
00249     
00250     std::map<string, string>::iterator columnsIterator;
00251     for (columnsIterator = m_listOfColumnsToAdd.begin(); columnsIterator != m_listOfColumnsToAdd.end(); columnsIterator++)
00252     {
00253         std::string dbColumnName = columnsIterator->first;
00254         std::string columnType = columnsIterator->second;
00255         
00256         m_columnNameToColumnTypeMap.insert(std::make_pair(dbColumnName, columnType)); 
00257                 
00258         std::stringstream sqlStatement; 
00259         sqlStatement << "ALTER TABLE Annotations ADD [" << dbColumnName << "] " << columnType;
00260         
00261         if(sqlite3_exec(m_annotationDb, sqlStatement.str().c_str(), NULL, 0, &errorMessage))
00262         {
00263             std::stringstream message;
00264             message << "Cannot add column '" << dbColumnName << "' ! ";
00265             if (errorMessage != NULL)
00266             {
00267                 message << errorMessage;
00268                 delete(errorMessage);
00269             }
00270             throw Except(message.str().c_str());
00271         }
00272     }
00273     
00274     AptVerboseWrapper::out(2, LIST_OF_COLUMNS_FROM_TSV_FILES, true);
00275     for (columnsIterator = m_listOfColumnsToAdd.begin(); columnsIterator != m_listOfColumnsToAdd.end(); columnsIterator++)
00276     {
00277         AptVerboseWrapper::out(2, columnsIterator->first, true);
00278     }            
00279 }

00284 int64_t IntsToLong(int High, int Low)
00285 {
00286     return (((int64_t)High) << 32) | ((unsigned int)Low);
00287 }
00288 void LongToInts(int64_t Long, int &High, int &Low)
00289 {
00290     High = (int)(Long >> 32);
00291     Low = (int)Long;
00292 }
00293 
00294 void AnnotationTable::AnalyzeFiles(std::vector<std::string> ListOfTsvFileNames)
00295 {
00296     if (ListOfTsvFileNames.size() == 0) 
00297     {
00298         return;
00299     }
00300     else if (ListOfTsvFileNames.size() == 1)
00301     {
00302         AptVerboseWrapper::out(1, ANALYZING_FILE, true); 
00303     }
00304     else
00305     {
00306         AptVerboseWrapper::out(1, ANALYZING_FILES, true);
00307     }    
00308     
00309     
00310     std::map<string, int> probeSetIds; //  <probeSetId, LineNumber>
00311     m_identicalLinesToSkip.clear();
00312     m_linesWithDupProbeIds.clear();
00313     
00314     int probeSetIdDuplicationCounter = 0;
00315     const int limitOfErrorsInLogFile = 10;
00316     static const char* DUPLICATED_PROBSET_ID_ERROR = "File contains duplicated ProbeSet_IDs for records with different values. See the log file for details";
00317         
00318     int totalLinesCount = 0;
00319     bool needToCheckRequiredColumnsSomeValue = true;
00320     bool needToCheckRequiredColumnsPrefixCheck = true;
00321     
00322     for (unsigned int fileIndex = 0; fileIndex < ListOfTsvFileNames.size(); fileIndex++)
00323     {
00324         
00325         std::string fileName = ListOfTsvFileNames[fileIndex];
00326         AnnotationTsv* tsvFile = new AnnotationTsv();        
00327         
00328         if(tsvFile->open(fileName) != TSV_OK)
00329         {            
00330             delete(tsvFile);   
00331             
00332             std::string message = "Unable to open file '" + fileName + "'";
00333             throw Except(message.c_str());              
00334         }
00335         else
00336         {
00337             int64_t fileSize = Fs::fileSize(fileName, false);
00338             std::string scale = "1% ----------- 50% ----------- 100%";
00339             int numberOfSteps = scale.size();
00340             int stepSize = (int)(fileSize / numberOfSteps);
00341             int step = 0;
00342             int lastStep = 0;             
00343 
00344             AptVerboseWrapper::progressBegin(1, "Analyzing file " + Fs::basename(fileName) + "\n", numberOfSteps, 1, numberOfSteps);
00345             AptVerboseWrapper::out(1, scale + "\n", true);
00346             
00347             BuildCsvColumnList(tsvFile);            
00348             
00349             while (tsvFile->nextLine() == TSV_OK)
00350             {  
00351                 totalLinesCount++;
00352                               
00353                 /// Analyze required columns
00354                     
00355                     if (needToCheckRequiredColumnsSomeValue && m_configPtr->m_requiredColumnsSomeValue.size() > 0)
00356                     {   
00357                         bool allRequiredColumnsSomeValueChecked = true;
00358                         
00359                         std::map<string, RequiredColumn>::iterator requiredColunm;                        
00360                         for (requiredColunm = m_configPtr->m_requiredColumnsSomeValue.begin(); requiredColunm != m_configPtr->m_requiredColumnsSomeValue.end(); requiredColunm++)
00361                         {
00362                             if (false == requiredColunm->second.m_verified)                            
00363                             {
00364                                 allRequiredColumnsSomeValueChecked = false;
00365                                 string columnName = requiredColunm->first;
00366                                 std::vector<std::string>::iterator column = find(m_csvColumns.begin(), m_csvColumns.end(), columnName);
00367                                 if ( column != m_csvColumns.end()) 
00368                                 {// Column exist in this file
00369                                     string fieldValue;
00370                                     tsvFile->get(0, columnName, fieldValue);
00371                                     if (fieldValue != "")
00372                                     {
00373                                         requiredColunm->second.m_verified = true;
00374                                     }
00375                                 }                                                                 
00376                             }
00377                         }
00378                         if (allRequiredColumnsSomeValueChecked)
00379                         {
00380                             needToCheckRequiredColumnsSomeValue = false;
00381                         }
00382                     }
00383                     
00384                     if (needToCheckRequiredColumnsPrefixCheck && m_configPtr->m_requiredColumnsPrefixCheck.size() > 0)
00385                     {   
00386                         bool allRequiredColumnsPrefixCheckChecked = true;
00387                         
00388                         std::map<string, RequiredColumn>::iterator prefixCheck;                        
00389                         for (prefixCheck = m_configPtr->m_requiredColumnsPrefixCheck.begin(); 
00390                                 prefixCheck != m_configPtr->m_requiredColumnsPrefixCheck.end(); prefixCheck++)
00391                         {
00392                             if (false == prefixCheck->second.m_verified)                            
00393                             {
00394                                 allRequiredColumnsPrefixCheckChecked = false;
00395                                 string columnName = prefixCheck->first;
00396                                 std::vector<std::string>::iterator column = find(m_csvColumns.begin(), m_csvColumns.end(), columnName);
00397                                 if ( column != m_csvColumns.end()) 
00398                                 {// Column exist in this file
00399                                     string fieldValue;                                                                        
00400                                     tsvFile->get(0, columnName, fieldValue);
00401                                     
00402                                     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < prefixCheck->second.Prefixes.size(); i++)
00403                                     {
00404                                         string prefix = prefixCheck->second.Prefixes[i];
00405                                         size_t found = fieldValue.find(prefix);
00406                                         if (found != std::string::npos && 0 == (int)found)
00407                                         {
00408                                             prefixCheck->second.Prefixes.erase(find(prefixCheck->second.Prefixes.begin(), 
00409                                                                                     prefixCheck->second.Prefixes.end(),prefix));
00410                                         }
00411                                     }                                    
00412                                     
00413                                     if (prefixCheck->second.Prefixes.size() == 0)
00414                                     {
00415                                         prefixCheck->second.m_verified = true;
00416                                     }                                    
00417                                 }                                                                 
00418                             }
00419                         }
00420                         if (allRequiredColumnsPrefixCheckChecked)
00421                         {
00422                             needToCheckRequiredColumnsPrefixCheck = false;
00423                         }
00424                     }
00425                     
00426                     std::map<string, RequiredColumn>::iterator  requiredColumn;
00427                     for (requiredColumn = m_configPtr->m_requiredColumnsNoEmptyValues.begin(); 
00428                             requiredColumn != m_configPtr->m_requiredColumnsNoEmptyValues.end(); requiredColumn++)
00429                     {
00430                         string columnName = requiredColumn->first;
00431                         std::vector<std::string>::iterator column = find(m_csvColumns.begin(), m_csvColumns.end(), columnName);
00432                         if ( column != m_csvColumns.end()) 
00433                         { // Column exist in this file
00434                             string fieldValue;                                                
00435                             tsvFile->get(0, columnName, fieldValue);
00436                             if (fieldValue.empty())
00437                             {
00438                                 requiredColumn->second.m_error = true;
00439                                 switch(requiredColumn->second.Severity)
00440                                {
00441                                     case Error:
00442                                         requiredColumn->second.ErrorCounter++;
00443                                         if (requiredColumn->second.ErrorCounter <= RequiredColumn::MaxNumberOfMessages) 
00444                                         {
00445                                             std::stringstream message;
00446                                             message << "Error! Required column '" << requiredColumn->first << "' is missing its value! File '" << Fs::basename(fileName) << "' Data line " << tsvFile->lineNum() << " \n";
00447                                             message <<  requiredColumn->second.Message;
00448                                             AptVerboseWrapper::out(0, message.str());
00449                                         }
00450                                     break;
00451                                     case Warning:
00452                                         requiredColumn->second.WarningCounter++;
00453                                         if (requiredColumn->second.WarningCounter <= RequiredColumn::MaxNumberOfMessages)
00454                                         {                            
00455                                             std::stringstream message;
00456                                             message << "WARNING! Required column '" << requiredColumn->first << "' is missing its value! File '" << Fs::basename(fileName) << "' Data line " << tsvFile->lineNum() << " \n";
00457                                             message <<  requiredColumn->second.Message;
00458                                             AptVerboseWrapper::out(1, message.str());
00459                                         }
00460                                     break;
00461                                     case Information:                                        
00462                                         if (requiredColumn->second.WarningCounter <= RequiredColumn::MaxNumberOfMessages)
00463                                         {                            
00464                                             std::stringstream message;
00465                                             message << "Column '" << requiredColumn->first << "' is missing its value! File '" << Fs::basename(fileName) << "' Data line " << tsvFile->lineNum() << " \n";
00466                                             message <<  requiredColumn->second.Message;
00467                                             AptVerboseWrapper::out(1, message.str());
00468                                         }
00469                                     break;
00470                                }                                                            
00471                             }
00472                         }                       
00473                     }                    
00474                 //
00475                 
00476                 /// Analyze ProbeSet Uniqueness
00477                 string probeSetId;
00478                 tsvFile->get(0, PROBE_SET_ID_IN_CSV, probeSetId);
00479                 if (probeSetId.empty())
00480                 {
00481                      std::stringstream message;                                                
00482                      message << "Probe Set ID column in empty at file '" << fileName <<" data line "<< tsvFile->lineNum();
00483                      throw Except(message.str().c_str());
00484                 }                
00485                 map<string, int>::iterator find = probeSetIds.find(probeSetId);                    
00486                 if (find != probeSetIds.end())
00487                 { // Found duplicated probe set id
00488                     if (fileIndex == 0)
00489                     { //  Analyze Probe Set Id uniqueness only for the first file, for other files records will be updated 
00490                                    
00491                         //First, find out if dup Probe Set ID lines are exactly the same.
00492                         std::vector<string> firstRecord;
00493                         std::vector<string> currentRecord;
00494                         for(int columnIndex = 0; columnIndex < tsvFile->GetColumnCount(); columnIndex++)
00495                         { // Get current dup record fields
00496                             string fieldValue;
00497                             tsvFile->get(0, columnIndex, fieldValue);
00498                             currentRecord.push_back(fieldValue);
00499                         }
00500                         
00501                         ////// Get previous dup record fields
00502                         
00503                        int saveCurrentLinePos = tsvFile->lineNumber();
00504                        tsvFile->gotoLine(find->second - 1);
00505                        for(int columnIndex = 0; columnIndex < tsvFile->GetColumnCount(); columnIndex++)
00506                        {
00507                             string fieldValue;
00508                             tsvFile->get(0, columnIndex, fieldValue);
00509                             firstRecord.push_back(fieldValue);
00510                        }
00511                        tsvFile->gotoLine(saveCurrentLinePos);
00512                         
00513                         bool identicalRecords = true;
00514                         if (firstRecord.size() == currentRecord.size())
00515                         {
00516                             for (unsigned int r = 0; r < firstRecord.size(); r++)
00517                             {
00518                                 if (firstRecord[r] != currentRecord[r])
00519                                 {
00520                                     affx::dequote(firstRecord[r]);
00521                                     affx::dequote(currentRecord[r]);
00522                                     if (firstRecord[r] != currentRecord[r])
00523                                     {                                
00524                                         identicalRecords = false;
00525                                         break;            
00526                                     }
00527                                 }
00528                             }                        
00529                         }
00530                         else
00531                         {
00532                             identicalRecords = false;                        
00533                         }
00534                         
00535                         if (identicalRecords)
00536                         {// If the whole line in the txt files is duplicated, we do not treat it as an error, just log a warning.    
00537                             
00538                             if (m_identicalLinesToSkip.size() <= 50000)
00539                             {
00540                                 m_identicalLinesToSkip.push_back(tsvFile->lineNumber());
00541                                                      
00542                                 std::stringstream message;
00543                                 message << "WARNING! Identical record was detected in '"<< fileName << "'! Probe Set ID '" << probeSetId <<"'";
00544                                 message << " First record: Data line " << find->second; 
00545                                 message << " Second record: Data line " << tsvFile->lineNum();                        
00546                                 message << " The second record will be skipped."; 
00547                                 
00548                                 AptVerboseWrapper::out(0, message.str());
00549                             }
00550                             else
00551                             {// For the performance reason
00552                                  throw Except("There are too many duplicated identical record in the file(s). See the log file for details.");
00553                             }
00554                         }
00555                         else
00556                         {                            
00557                             probeSetIdDuplicationCounter++;
00558                             if (probeSetIdDuplicationCounter < limitOfErrorsInLogFile)
00559                             {
00560                                 std::stringstream dupMessage;
00561                                 dupMessage << "Error! The following Probe Set ID '" << probeSetId <<"' is duplicated and fields value(s) are different or their order is different!";
00562                                 dupMessage << " File Name: '" << fileName << "'";
00563                                 dupMessage << " First record: Data line " << find->second; 
00564                                 dupMessage << " Second record: Data line " << tsvFile->lineNum() << " !";
00565                                 AptVerboseWrapper::out(0, dupMessage.str());
00566                             }
00567                             else
00568                             {
00569                                throw Except(DUPLICATED_PROBSET_ID_ERROR);
00570                             }                            
00571                         }
00572                     }
00573                     else
00574                     { // 2, 3 .. n files
00575                         m_linesWithDupProbeIds.insert(std::make_pair(IntsToLong(fileIndex, tsvFile->lineNum()), 0));
00576                     }
00577                 }
00578                 else
00579                 {                    
00580                     probeSetIds.insert(std::make_pair(probeSetId, tsvFile->lineNum()));
00581                 }
00582                 
00583                 // Update progress indicator
00584                 std::fstream::pos_type p = tsvFile->line_fpos();
00585                 // fpos_t currectPosition = p.seekpos();
00586                 
00587                 step = (int) (((int) p) / stepSize);                
00588                 if (step > lastStep)
00589                 {                       
00590                     int numberOfStepsToDisplay = step - lastStep; 
00591                     if (numberOfStepsToDisplay > numberOfSteps)
00592                     {
00593                         numberOfStepsToDisplay = numberOfSteps;
00594                     }
00595                     for (int s = 0; s < numberOfStepsToDisplay; s++)
00596                     { // this "for" is needed for very small files
00597                         AptVerboseWrapper::progressStep(1);
00598                     }
00599                     lastStep = step;
00600                 }
00601                 //////////////////////////////////////////
00602                  
00603             }                        
00604             
00605             for (int s = step; s < numberOfSteps; s++)
00606             {
00607                 AptVerboseWrapper::progressStep(1);
00608             }
00609             AptVerboseWrapper::progressEnd(1, "\nDone"); 
00610         }         
00611         tsvFile->close();
00612         delete(tsvFile);
00613     }
00614         
00615     if (probeSetIdDuplicationCounter > 0)
00616     {
00617         throw Except(DUPLICATED_PROBSET_ID_ERROR);
00618     }
00619     
00620     ReportRequiredColumns();
00621             
00622     if (m_identicalLinesToSkip.size() > 0)
00623     {
00624         AptVerboseWrapper::out(0, "WARNING! Some lines with identical record were detected! See the log file for details.\n", true);
00625     }
00626     
00627     ReportNumberOfRecordsToInsertUpdate(totalLinesCount);    
00628 }
00629 
00630 void AnnotationTable::ReportRequiredColumns()
00631 {
00632 
00633     std::map<string, RequiredColumn>::iterator requiredColumn;
00634             
00635     string requiredColumnErrorMessage;
00636     string requiredColumnWarningMessage;
00637     string requiredColumnInfoMessage;
00638     for (requiredColumn = m_configPtr->m_requiredColumnsNoEmptyValues.begin(); requiredColumn != m_configPtr->m_requiredColumnsNoEmptyValues.end(); requiredColumn++)
00639         {    
00640             if (requiredColumn->second.m_error)
00641             {                 
00642                 switch(requiredColumn->second.Severity)
00643                 {
00644                     case Error:
00645                         if (requiredColumnErrorMessage != "")
00646                         {
00647                             requiredColumnErrorMessage += ", ";
00648                         }            
00649                         requiredColumnErrorMessage += "'" + requiredColumn->first + "'";
00650                         break;
00651                     case Warning:
00652                         if (requiredColumnWarningMessage != "")
00653                         {
00654                             requiredColumnWarningMessage += ", ";
00655                         }            
00656                         requiredColumnWarningMessage += "'" + requiredColumn->first + "'";
00657                         break;
00658                     case Information:
00659                         if (requiredColumnInfoMessage != "")
00660                         {
00661                             requiredColumnInfoMessage += ", ";
00662                         }            
00663                         requiredColumnInfoMessage += "'" + requiredColumn->first + "'";
00664                         break;
00665                 }            
00666             }
00667         }
00668     
00669     
00670     if (requiredColumnInfoMessage != "")
00671     {
00672         requiredColumnInfoMessage = "The following column(s) have empty values: " + requiredColumnInfoMessage;
00673         requiredColumnInfoMessage += ". See the log file for details.";
00674         Verbose::out(1, requiredColumnInfoMessage.c_str());
00675     }
00676     
00677     if (requiredColumnWarningMessage != "")
00678     {
00679         requiredColumnWarningMessage = "WARNING! The following recommended column(s) have empty values: " + requiredColumnWarningMessage;
00680         requiredColumnWarningMessage += ". See the log file for details.";
00681         Verbose::out(0, requiredColumnWarningMessage.c_str());
00682     }
00683     
00684     if (requiredColumnErrorMessage != "")
00685     {
00686         requiredColumnErrorMessage = "The following required column(s) have empty values: " + requiredColumnErrorMessage;
00687         requiredColumnErrorMessage += ". See the log file for details.";
00688         throw Except(requiredColumnErrorMessage.c_str());
00689     }
00690     
00691     std::stringstream errorMessage;
00692     std::stringstream warningMessage;
00693     std::stringstream infoMessage;
00694     int errorCounter = 0;
00695     int warningCounter = 0;
00696     int infoCounter = 0;
00697     
00698     std::map<string, RequiredColumn>::iterator requiredColunm;
00699                         
00700     for (requiredColunm = m_configPtr->m_requiredColumnsSomeValue.begin(); requiredColunm != m_configPtr->m_requiredColumnsSomeValue.end(); requiredColunm++)
00701     {
00702         if (false == requiredColunm->second.m_verified)
00703         {
00704             switch(requiredColunm->second.Severity)
00705             {
00706                 case Error:
00707                     if (errorCounter == 0)
00708                     { 
00709                         errorMessage << "The following required column(s) are entirely empty: ";
00710                     }
00711                     else
00712                     {
00713                         errorMessage << ", ";
00714                     }
00715                     errorMessage << "'" << requiredColunm->first/*Column Name*/ << "'";
00716                     errorMessage << " - " << requiredColunm->second.Message << " ";
00717                     
00718                     errorCounter++;
00719                     break;
00720                 case Warning:
00721                     if (warningCounter == 0)
00722                     { 
00723                         warningMessage << "WARNING! The following recommended column(s) are entirely empty: ";
00724                     }
00725                     else
00726                     {
00727                         warningMessage << ", ";
00728                     }
00729                     warningMessage << "'" << requiredColunm->first/*Column Name*/ << "'";
00730                     warningMessage << " - " << requiredColunm->second.Message << " ";
00731                                     
00732                     warningCounter++;
00733                     break;
00734                 case Information:
00735                     if (infoCounter == 0)
00736                     { 
00737                         infoMessage << "The following column(s) are entirely empty: ";
00738                     }
00739                     else
00740                     {
00741                         infoMessage << ", ";
00742                     }
00743                     infoMessage << "'" << requiredColunm->first/*Column Name*/ << "'";
00744                     infoMessage << " - " << requiredColunm->second.Message << " ";
00745                                     
00746                     infoCounter++;
00747                     break;
00748             }            
00749         }
00750     }
00751     if (infoCounter > 0)
00752     {
00753         infoMessage << ". Should have at least a single value.";                    
00754         Verbose::out(0, infoMessage.str());
00755     }
00756     
00757     if (warningCounter > 0)
00758     {
00759         warningMessage << ". Should have at least a single value.";                    
00760         Verbose::out(0, warningMessage.str());
00761     }               
00762   
00763     if (errorCounter > 0)
00764     {
00765         errorMessage << ". Should have at least a single value.";                    
00766         throw Except(errorMessage.str().c_str());
00767     }
00768     
00769     errorMessage.clear();
00770     warningMessage.clear();
00771     infoMessage.clear();
00772     errorCounter = 0;
00773     warningCounter = 0;
00774     infoCounter = 0;
00775     
00776                         
00777     for (requiredColunm = m_configPtr->m_requiredColumnsPrefixCheck.begin(); requiredColunm != m_configPtr->m_requiredColumnsPrefixCheck.end(); requiredColunm++)
00778     {
00779         if (false == requiredColunm->second.m_verified)
00780         {
00781             switch(requiredColunm->second.Severity)
00782             {
00783                 case Error:
00784                     if (errorCounter == 0)
00785                     { 
00786                         errorMessage << "The following column(s) is missing the required prefix(es): ";
00787                     }
00788                     else
00789                     {
00790                         errorMessage << "; ";
00791                     }
00792                     errorMessage << "Column '" << requiredColunm->first/*Column Name*/ << "'";
00793                     
00794                     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < requiredColunm->second.Prefixes.size(); i++)
00795                     {
00796                         if (i == 0)
00797                         {
00798                             errorMessage << " Prefix(es) - ";
00799                         }                 
00800                         else
00801                         {
00802                             errorMessage << ", ";
00803                         }                       
00804                         errorMessage << "'" << requiredColunm->second.Prefixes[i] << "' ";
00805                     }
00806                     errorMessage << " " << requiredColunm->second.Message << " ";
00807                     
00808                     errorCounter++;
00809                 break;
00810                 case Warning:
00811                     if (warningCounter == 0)
00812                     { 
00813                         warningMessage << "WARNING! The following column(s) is missing the required prefix(es): ";
00814                     }
00815                     else
00816                     {
00817                         warningMessage << ", ";
00818                     }
00819                     
00820                     warningMessage << "Column '" << requiredColunm->first/*Column Name*/ << "'";
00821                     
00822                     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < requiredColunm->second.Prefixes.size(); i++)
00823                     {
00824                         if (i == 0)
00825                         {
00826                             warningMessage << " Prefix(es) - ";
00827                         }                 
00828                         else
00829                         {
00830                             warningMessage << ", ";
00831                         }                       
00832                         warningMessage << "'" << requiredColunm->second.Prefixes[i] << "' ";
00833                     }
00834                     warningMessage << " " << requiredColunm->second.Message << " ";                                
00835                                     
00836                     warningCounter++;
00837                 break;
00838                 case Information:
00839                     if (infoCounter == 0)
00840                     { 
00841                         infoMessage << "The following column(s) is missing the prefix(es): ";
00842                     }
00843                     else
00844                     {
00845                         infoMessage << ", ";
00846                     }
00847                     
00848                     infoMessage << "Column '" << requiredColunm->first/*Column Name*/ << "'";
00849                     
00850                     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < requiredColunm->second.Prefixes.size(); i++)
00851                     {
00852                         if (i == 0)
00853                         {
00854                             infoMessage << " Prefix(es) - ";
00855                         }                 
00856                         else
00857                         {
00858                             infoMessage << ", ";
00859                         }                       
00860                         infoMessage << "'" << requiredColunm->second.Prefixes[i] << "' ";
00861                     }
00862                     infoMessage << " " << requiredColunm->second.Message << " ";                                
00863                                     
00864                     infoCounter++;
00865                 break;
00866             }            
00867         }
00868     }
00869     
00870     if (infoCounter > 0)
00871     {        
00872         Verbose::out(1, infoMessage.str());
00873     } 
00874     
00875     if (warningCounter > 0)
00876     {        
00877         Verbose::out(0, warningMessage.str());
00878     }               
00879   
00880     if (errorCounter > 0)
00881     {     
00882         throw Except(errorMessage.str().c_str());
00883     }
00884     
00885 }
00886 
00887 void AnnotationTable::ReportNumberOfRecordsToInsertUpdate(int TotalLinesCount)
00888 {
00889     std::stringstream message;
00890     message << "\n" << (TotalLinesCount - m_linesWithDupProbeIds.size()) << " records will be imported into the database. ";
00891     if (m_linesWithDupProbeIds.size() > 0)
00892     {
00893         message << m_linesWithDupProbeIds.size() << " update(s)";
00894     }
00895     message << "\n";
00896     
00897     AptVerboseWrapper::out(2, message.str(), true);
00898 }
00899 
00900 void AnnotationTable::BindFieldValue(AnnotationTsv* TsvFilePtr, std::string &DbColumnName, std::string &CsvColumnName, std::string &FieldValue)
00901 {   
00902     std::string columnType = m_columnNameToColumnTypeMap[DbColumnName]; 
00903         
00904     int parameterIndex;
00905     
00906     if (m_updateRowMode)
00907     {    
00908         parameterIndex = m_updateBindingMap[DbColumnName];      
00909     }
00910     else
00911     {
00912         parameterIndex = m_insertBindingMap[DbColumnName];     
00913     }
00914     
00915     /// Special case for the chromosome column
00916     if (columnType == DB_TYPE_INTEGER && DbColumnName == "Chr_id")
00917     {
00918         int64_t chr_id_Key = m_chromosomeTablePtr->GetKey(FieldValue);
00919         if (sqlite3_bind_int64(m_currentStatement, parameterIndex, chr_id_Key) != SQLITE_OK) 
00920         {
00921             ReportTsvErrorStopDbInsertion("Could not bind integer ", TsvFilePtr->lineNum(), FieldValue, CsvColumnName, columnType);
00922         }
00923         return;
00924     }
00925     ////////////
00926     
00927     if (FieldValue == "---" || FieldValue == "DBNULL")
00928     {
00929         return;
00930     }
00931     
00932     if (columnType == DB_TYPE_INTEGER)
00933     {   
00934         if (false == FieldValue.empty())
00935         {
00936             int64_t int64Val;
00937             std::stringstream iss(FieldValue);            
00938             if ((iss >> int64Val).fail())
00939             {
00940                 ReportTsvErrorStopDbInsertion("Could not convert to integer ",TsvFilePtr->lineNum(), FieldValue, CsvColumnName, columnType);
00941             }
00942             else
00943             {
00944                 stringstream checkConvertion;
00945                 checkConvertion << int64Val;
00946                 
00947                 if (checkConvertion.str() != FieldValue)
00948                 {
00949                     ReportTsvErrorStopDbInsertion("Could not convert to integer ",TsvFilePtr->lineNum(), FieldValue, CsvColumnName, columnType);
00950                 }
00951                 else
00952                 {
00953                     if (sqlite3_bind_int64(m_currentStatement, parameterIndex, int64Val) != SQLITE_OK) 
00954                     {
00955                         ReportTsvErrorStopDbInsertion("Could not bind integer ", TsvFilePtr->lineNum(), FieldValue, CsvColumnName, columnType);
00956                     }
00957                 }
00958             }
00959         }
00960     }
00961     else if ( columnType == DB_TYPE_REAL)
00962     { 
00963         if (false == FieldValue.empty())
00964         {
00965             double d;                        
00966             std::istringstream iss(FieldValue);            
00967 
00968             if ((iss >> d).fail())
00969             {
00970                 ReportTsvErrorStopDbInsertion("Could not convert to float", TsvFilePtr->lineNum(), FieldValue, CsvColumnName, columnType);
00971             }
00972             else
00973             {
00974                 if (sqlite3_bind_double(m_currentStatement, parameterIndex, d) != SQLITE_OK) 
00975                 {
00976                     ReportTsvErrorStopDbInsertion("Could not bind float", TsvFilePtr->lineNum(), FieldValue, CsvColumnName, columnType);
00977                 }
00978              }
00979         }
00980     }
00981     else if ( columnType == DB_TYPE_TEXT)
00982     {    
00983         int result = sqlite3_bind_text(m_currentStatement, parameterIndex, FieldValue.c_str(), FieldValue.length(), SQLITE_TRANSIENT);
00984         if (result != SQLITE_OK) 
00985         {
00986             ReportTsvErrorStopDbInsertion("Could not bind string", TsvFilePtr->lineNum(), FieldValue, CsvColumnName, columnType);
00987         }
00988     }
00989     else
00990     {
00991         ReportTsvErrorStopDbInsertion("Internal error! Cannot get a column type for the column:", TsvFilePtr->lineNum(), FieldValue, CsvColumnName, columnType);                    
00992     }                
00993 }
00994 
00995 void AnnotationTable::BuildCsvColumnList(AnnotationTsv* TsvFilePtr)
00996 {   
00997     m_csvColumns.clear();
00998     for(int columnIndex = 0; columnIndex < TsvFilePtr->GetColumnCount(); columnIndex++)
00999     {
01000         string columnName = TsvFilePtr->getColumnName(0, columnIndex);
01001         StringUtilities::CheckColumnName(columnName, columnIndex);
01002         m_csvColumns.push_back(columnName);
01003     }
01004 }
01005 
01006 void AnnotationTable::BuildCsvColumnIndexToColumnNameMap(AnnotationTsv* TsvFilePtr)
01007 {   
01008     m_csvColumnIndexToColumnNameMap.clear();
01009     for(int columnIndex = 0; columnIndex < TsvFilePtr->GetColumnCount(); columnIndex++)
01010     {
01011         string columnName = TsvFilePtr->getColumnName(0, columnIndex);
01012         StringUtilities::CheckColumnName(columnName, columnIndex);
01013         if (columnName == PROBE_SET_ID_IN_CSV)
01014         {
01015             m_probeSetIdIndex = columnIndex;
01016         }
01017         m_csvColumnIndexToColumnNameMap.insert(std::make_pair(columnIndex, columnName));
01018     }
01019 }
01020 
01021 void AnnotationTable::GetCsvColumnName(int ColumnIndex, string &CsvColumnName)
01022 {
01023     map<int,string>::iterator csvNameIterator = m_csvColumnIndexToColumnNameMap.find(ColumnIndex);    
01024     if ( csvNameIterator != m_csvColumnIndexToColumnNameMap.end())
01025     { 
01026         CsvColumnName = csvNameIterator->second; // As it is in CSV
01027     }
01028     else
01029     {
01030         FinalizeStatements();
01031         throw Except("Internal error! Cannot map column name!");                                                                    
01032     }
01033 }
01034 string AnnotationTable::GetRowCount(string ProbeSet_Id)
01035 {
01036     char *errorMessage = NULL;
01037     string statement = "Select count(*) from Annotations WHERE ProbeSet_ID = '" + ProbeSet_Id + "'";
01038     if(sqlite3_exec(m_annotationDb, statement.c_str(), AnnotationTable::RowCountCallback, 0, &errorMessage) != SQLITE_OK)
01039       {
01040         std::string message = "WARNING! Cannot get row count from Annotations table! ";
01041         if (errorMessage != NULL)
01042         {
01043             message += errorMessage;
01044             delete(errorMessage);
01045         }
01046         AptVerboseWrapper::out(0, message, true);
01047       }
01048       return m_rowCount;
01049 }
01050 int AnnotationTable::RowCountCallback(void *NotUsed, int argc, char **argv, char **azColName)
01051 {    
01052     m_rowCount = argv[0];
01053     return 0;
01054 }
01055 
01056 const int parConversionArraySize = 8;
01057 const char* parConversionArray[parConversionArraySize][3] = 
01058 {
01059     {"1","0","1"},
01060     {"0","1","2"},
01061     {"0","0","0"},
01062     {"---","0","0"},
01063     {"0","---","0"},
01064     {"---","1","2"},
01065     {"1","---","1"},
01066     {"---","---","DBNULL"}
01067 };
01068 
01069 bool AnnotationTable::InsertTsvFiles(std::vector<std::string> ListOfTsvFileNames)
01070 {   
01071     if (ListOfTsvFileNames.size() == 0) 
01072     {
01073         return true;
01074     }
01075     else if (ListOfTsvFileNames.size() == 1)
01076     {
01077         AptVerboseWrapper::out(1, IMPORTING_FILE_INTO_DATABASE, true);
01078     }
01079     else
01080     {
01081         AptVerboseWrapper::out(1, IMPORTING_FILES_INTO_DATABASE, true);
01082     }
01083     
01084     m_stopDbInsertion = false;    
01085     
01086     m_updateStatement = NULL;
01087     m_insertStatement = NULL;
01088     
01089     bool anyDupsInFiles = m_linesWithDupProbeIds.size() > 0;
01090     
01091     for (unsigned int fileIndex = 0; fileIndex < ListOfTsvFileNames.size(); fileIndex++)
01092     {
01093         int updateMessageCounter = 0;
01094         std::string fileName = ListOfTsvFileNames[fileIndex];
01095         
01096         AnnotationTsv* tsvFile = new AnnotationTsv();                 
01097         if(tsvFile->open(fileName) != TSV_OK)
01098         {            
01099             delete(tsvFile); 
01100             std::string message = "Unable to open file '" + fileName + "'";
01101             FinalizeStatements();
01102             throw Except(message.c_str());              
01103         }
01104         else        
01105         { 
01106             int64_t fileSize = Fs::fileSize(fileName, false);
01107             std::string scale = "1% ----------- 50% ----------- 100%";
01108             int numberOfSteps = scale.size();
01109             int stepSize = (int)(fileSize / numberOfSteps);
01110             int step = 0;
01111             int lastStep = 0; 
01112                       
01113             AptVerboseWrapper::progressBegin(1, "Importing file " + Fs::basename(fileName) + "\n" , numberOfSteps, 1, numberOfSteps);
01114             AptVerboseWrapper::out(1, scale + "\n", true);
01115             
01116             // Read tsvFile file                                    
01117             BuildCsvColumnIndexToColumnNameMap(tsvFile);
01118             PrepareInsertStatement(tsvFile);
01119             PrepareUpdateStatement(tsvFile); 
01120    
01121             m_updateRowMode = false;
01122             m_currentStatement = m_insertStatement;
01123     
01124             int columnCount = tsvFile->GetColumnCount();                                    
01125             string csvColumnName;
01126             std::string fieldValue;                        
01127             
01128             while (tsvFile->nextLine() == TSV_OK)
01129             {         
01130                 
01131                 if (fileIndex == 0)    
01132                 {
01133                     std::vector<int>::iterator isLineToSkip = find(m_identicalLinesToSkip.begin(), m_identicalLinesToSkip.end(), tsvFile->lineNumber());                
01134                     if ( isLineToSkip != m_identicalLinesToSkip.end())
01135                     {
01136                         continue;
01137                     }
01138                 }                 
01139                 
01140                 string par1CsvColumnValue = "";
01141                 string par2CsvColumnValue = "";
01142                 int parColumnsCounter = 0;
01143                 
01144                 if (anyDupsInFiles)
01145                 {
01146                     if (fileIndex == 0)
01147                     {// Probe Set ID in the FIRST file must be unique, so first file is always in the insert mode
01148                         m_updateRowMode = false;
01149                     }
01150                     else
01151                     {
01152                         if (m_linesWithDupProbeIds.find(IntsToLong(fileIndex, tsvFile->lineNum())) != m_linesWithDupProbeIds.end())
01153                         {
01154                             m_updateRowMode = true;
01155                             m_currentStatement = m_updateStatement;
01156                         }
01157                         else
01158                         {
01159                             m_updateRowMode = false;
01160                             m_currentStatement = m_insertStatement;
01161                         }                                                
01162                     }
01163                 }
01164                 for(int columnIndex = 0; columnIndex < columnCount; columnIndex++)
01165                 {
01166                     
01167                     tsvFile->get(0, columnIndex, fieldValue);
01168                     
01169                     if (updateMessageCounter < 50)
01170                     {
01171                         if (columnIndex == m_probeSetIdIndex && m_updateRowMode)
01172                         {
01173                             std::stringstream message;
01174                             message <<  "Record with Probe Set ID '"  << fieldValue << "' will be updated from file '" << fileName << "' Data line " << tsvFile->lineNum();
01175                             AptVerboseWrapper::out(3, message.str());
01176                             updateMessageCounter++;
01177                         }
01178                     }
01179                     else if (updateMessageCounter == 50)
01180                     {                        
01181                         AptVerboseWrapper::out(3, "Too many update messages in the log file! Other update messages will be omitted.");
01182                         updateMessageCounter++;
01183                     }
01184                     
01185                     
01186                     GetCsvColumnName(columnIndex, csvColumnName);
01187                     
01188                     if (m_configPtr->IsCloneableColumn(csvColumnName))
01189                     {
01190                         std::vector<string> columnClones = m_configPtr->GetColumnClones(csvColumnName);
01191                         m_configPtr->ConvertTsvToDbValue(columnClones[0], fieldValue);
01192                         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < columnClones.size(); i++)
01193                         {
01194                            BindFieldValue(tsvFile, columnClones[i], csvColumnName, fieldValue);
01195                         }
01196                     }
01197                     else if (csvColumnName == m_configPtr->m_par1CsvColumnName || csvColumnName == m_configPtr->m_par2CsvColumnName)
01198                     {// CSVTOSQLITE-74 PAR Columns handling. Hardcoded for now. If we will have similar cases with other columns, 
01199                      // it should be implemented as a customizable feature like the columns cloning
01200                         
01201                         parColumnsCounter++;
01202                         if (csvColumnName == m_configPtr->m_par1CsvColumnName)
01203                         {
01204                             par1CsvColumnValue = fieldValue;
01205                         }
01206                         else
01207                         {
01208                             par2CsvColumnValue = fieldValue;
01209                         }
01210                         if (parColumnsCounter == 2)
01211                         {
01212                             string parDbColumnValue = "";
01213                             for (int i = 0; i < parConversionArraySize; i++)
01214                             {
01215                                 if (par1CsvColumnValue == parConversionArray[i][0] && par2CsvColumnValue == parConversionArray[i][1])
01216                                 {
01217                                     parDbColumnValue = parConversionArray[i][2];
01218                                     break;
01219                                 }
01220                             }                                                             
01221                             
01222                             if (parDbColumnValue != "DBNULL")
01223                             {
01224                                 if (parDbColumnValue != "")                           
01225                                 {
01226                                     BindFieldValue(tsvFile, m_configPtr->m_parDbColumnName, csvColumnName, parDbColumnValue);
01227                                 }
01228                                 else
01229                                 {
01230                                    std::stringstream message;
01231                                    message << "'" << m_configPtr->m_par1CsvColumnName << "' - '" << m_configPtr->m_par2CsvColumnName << "'" << " columns pair has incorrect values. ";
01232                                    message << "'" << m_configPtr->m_par1CsvColumnName << "' = '" << par1CsvColumnValue << "', ";
01233                                    message << "'" << m_configPtr->m_par2CsvColumnName << "' = '" << par2CsvColumnValue << "'. ";
01234                                    ReportTsvErrorStopDbInsertion(message.str() , tsvFile->lineNum(), "", "", ""); 
01235                                 }
01236                             }                            
01237                         }
01238                     }
01239                     else
01240                     {// "Normal" column                
01241                         string dbColumnName = GetDbColumnNameFromLocalizationTable(csvColumnName);                                                
01242                                                 
01243                         m_configPtr->ConvertTsvToDbValue(csvColumnName, fieldValue);
01244                         
01245                         BindFieldValue(tsvFile, dbColumnName, csvColumnName, fieldValue);                        
01246                     }
01247                 }
01248                 
01249                 if (false == m_stopDbInsertion)
01250                 {
01251                     int result = sqlite3_step(m_currentStatement);
01252                     if (result != SQLITE_DONE) 
01253                     {  
01254                         std::stringstream message;
01255                         if (result == SQLITE_CONSTRAINT)
01256                         {
01257                             message << "Constraint violation at the data line  " << tsvFile->lineNum();
01258                         }
01259                         else
01260                         {
01261                             message << "Could not execute SQL statement. Data line " << tsvFile->lineNum();
01262                         }
01263                         
01264                         FinalizeStatements();
01265                         
01266                         throw Except(message.str().c_str());
01267                     }    
01268                 }
01269                 sqlite3_reset(m_currentStatement);
01270                 sqlite3_clear_bindings(m_currentStatement);
01271                 
01272                 std::fstream::pos_type p = tsvFile->line_fpos();
01273                 //fpos_t currectPosition = p.seekpos();
01274                
01275                 step = (int) (((int) p) / stepSize);
01276                 
01277                 if (step > lastStep)
01278                 {                       
01279                     int numberOfStepsToDisplay = step - lastStep; 
01280                     if (numberOfStepsToDisplay > numberOfSteps)
01281                     {
01282                         numberOfStepsToDisplay = numberOfSteps;
01283                     }
01284                     for (int s = 0; s < numberOfStepsToDisplay; s++)
01285                     { // this "for" is needed for very small files
01286                         AptVerboseWrapper::progressStep(1);
01287                     }
01288                     lastStep = step;
01289                 }
01290              }
01291              
01292              tsvFile->close();             
01293              delete(tsvFile);
01294              for (int s = step; s < numberOfSteps; s++)
01295              {
01296                 AptVerboseWrapper::progressStep(1);
01297              }
01298              AptVerboseWrapper::progressEnd(1, "\nDone");
01299          }
01300     }
01301     
01302     FinalizeStatements();
01303     
01304     return !m_stopDbInsertion;
01305 }
01306 
01307 void AnnotationTable::FinalizeStatements()
01308 {
01309     if (m_insertStatement != NULL)
01310     {
01311         sqlite3_finalize(m_insertStatement);
01312         m_insertStatement = NULL;
01313     }
01314     
01315     if (m_updateStatement != NULL)
01316     {
01317         sqlite3_finalize(m_updateStatement);
01318         m_updateStatement = NULL;
01319     }
01320 }
01321 
01322 string AnnotationTable::GetDbColumnNameFromLocalizationTable(string CsvColumnName)
01323 {
01324     string dbColumnName = m_localizationTablePtr->GetDbColumnName(CsvColumnName);
01325                         
01326     if (dbColumnName.empty())
01327     {
01328         FinalizeStatements();
01329         std::string errorStr;
01330         errorStr = "Internal error! Cannot get db column name for '" + CsvColumnName + "'!";
01331         throw Except(errorStr.c_str());
01332     } 
01333      
01334     return dbColumnName;
01335 }
01336 
01337 void AnnotationTable::ReportTsvErrorStopDbInsertion(std::string Message, int LineNumber, std::string FieldValue, 
01338                                                          std::string ColumnName, std::string ColumnType)
01339 {   
01340     m_stopDbInsertion = true;
01341          
01342     std::stringstream message;
01343     message << Message;
01344     
01345     message << " Data line " << LineNumber;        
01346     if (ColumnName != "")
01347     {
01348         message << ", column '" << ColumnName << "'";
01349     }
01350     if (ColumnType != "")
01351     {
01352         message << ", column type '" << ColumnType << "'";
01353     }
01354     if (FieldValue != "")
01355     {
01356         message << ", value '" << FieldValue << "'";
01357     }
01358     
01359     throw Except(message.str().c_str()); 
01360 }
